title: Does the video show a drunken and seduced speech?
subtitle: At least for the second time in modern memory, social media trolls slowed down in a video presentation of the Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belusi, to make it look like she was waving her speech.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A video showing the American speaker, Nancy Belusi, who's drunk and glowing her speech.
